name: SpitfireRadio
0:
”Alexa, open spit fire radio”
”Alexa, start spit fire radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spit fire radio
des:
Spitfire Radio
Our Online Radio station, broadcasting 24/7, features forgotten music, engaging military history content, and heartfelt interviews with veterans and their families. Complemented by a dedicated YouTube Channel, active social media platforms, and the Spitfire Academy program, we’re committed to making a positive impact.

Our Academy program is designed to educate young minds in military history and introduce them to the digital media landscape. Through school workshops and interactive educational days, we provide insights into the lives of individuals during World War II, allowing students to create and share their own content on our platforms

Spitfire Academy
Our Academy program is designed to educate young minds in military history and introduce them to the digital media landscape. Through school workshops and interactive educational days, we provide insights into the lives of individuals during World War II, allowing students to create and share their own content on our platforms.

Join us in our ambitious endeavor to preserve military heritage, educate the public, and create captivating content. Download our app and be part of Spitfire Radio’s journey.

Our Academy program is designed to educate young minds in military history and introduce them to the digital media landscape. Through school workshops and interactive educational days, we provide insights into the lives of individuals during World War II, allowing students to create and share their own content on our platforms

Digital Archiving
At Spitfire Radio, preserving stories and history is paramount. Our future plans include developing an online library for free and paid access, ensuring that future generations, schools, and researchers can benefit from this valuable resource.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
